data.title: Private Schools in Highland Township, IN
data.meta_description: Explore 2024 school ratings and statistics for private schools in Highland Township. Compare the best private schools near you.
data.text:
#45 Best Private High Schools in Indiana .

Oldenburg Academy of the Immaculate Conception

Blue checkmark.

Private School ,

OLDENBURG, IN ,

9-12 ,

59 Niche users give it an average review of 4.1 stars.

Featured Review: Parent says I am a parent of students who have graduated from Oldenburg Academy and am grateful for the education and experiences they had at OA. They were educated in a safe, supportive, caring environment... .

Read 59 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : A minus ,

Students : 158 ,

Student-Teacher Ratio : 11 to 1 ,

St. Louis Catholic School - Batesville

Blue checkmark.

Private School ,

BATESVILLE, IN ,

PK, K-8 ,

1 Niche users give it an average review of 4 stars.

Featured Review: Middle school student says It's ok, these reviews are overblown. Its a fine school, send your kids here if you want. I attended here and most things are up to par. .

Students : 328 ,

Student-Teacher Ratio : 12 to 1 ,
